patthana16.46:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.46:4.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana16.46:4.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.46:4.6: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.46:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.46:5.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.46:5.3: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
